Content:: Treasure Island (Russian: Остров сокровищ) is a 1971 Russian language Soviet adventure film directed by Yevgeni Fridman.[1][2][3] The elderly pirate Billy Bones settles in a tavern. Jim Hawkins finds in his chest a map of Treasure Island, collects a team and sets off on a journey.[4] This article related to a Soviet film is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Treasure Island (1971 film) - Wikipedia
